Uses of Class
core.Matrix

  • Packages that use Matrix 
    Package Description
    algorithm
    Contains all algorithms available to test with the simulator
    core
    Contains all core files based on basic theory of the simulator
    gate
    Contains all gates available to simulator

    • Uses of Matrix in algorithm

      Methods in algorithm that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix Shor.actOnRegister(Register r, int N)
      Calculates the hadamard transform of every qubit in the first register, leaving the second register unaffected.
      static Matrix Shor.projection(Register r, int N)
      Creates a matrix that is the tensor of two registers, and which will take a random orthonormal projection of the first register leaving the second unaffected.

    • Uses of Matrix in core

      Subclasses of Matrix in core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Qubit
      The Qubit class represents a linear superposition of states
      class  Register
      The Register class represents a quantum register that contains 'n' qubits
      class  State
      The state class represents an individual state in the form of a matrix
      Methods in core that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix Matrix.add(Matrix b)
      Adds another matrix to the current matrix

      Gets the matrix which represents a state

      Gets the matrix representing the Qubit

      Gets the tensor product with another matrix
      static Matrix Matrix.getTranspose(Matrix A)
      Gets the transpose of a matrix
      static Matrix Matrix.identity(int size)
      Creates an Identity matrix of a given size
      Matrix Matrix.mult(Matrix B)
      Multiplies the current matrix with another matrix
      Matrix Matrix.subtract(Matrix b)
      Subtracts another matrix from the current matrix
